fxInfo_label: Lower chamber members serve in government
fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: In practice, are members of the lower (or unicameral) chamber of the legislature able to serve simultaneously as ministers in the government?
fxInfo_scale: Dichotomous, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2lgsrvlo, *_osp, *_ord
